name: C. Disposition
statement:
Vasya bought the collected works of a well-known Berland poet Petya in
volumes. The volumes are numbered from to . He thinks that it does not
do to arrange the book simply according to their order. Vasya wants to
minimize the number of the disposition s the positive integers such that
for at least one () is true both: and at the same time , where is the
number of the tome that stands on the -th place and is the operation of
taking the division remainder. Naturally, one volume can occupy exactly
one place and in one place can stand exactly one volume.Help Vasya find
the volume disposition with the minimum number of divisors.
